text: 38:4 Aisaia 43:17; Esekiel 39:2; Daniel 11:40Kɨ nɨ damightɨ nɨ ighɨghɨregham, eghtɨ nɨ ko nɨn mɨdorozir gumaziba bar, kɨ akezibar ian aghozibar aghuigh, ia gekuigh ia inigh mangɨgham. Nɨn hoziaba, ko hoziabagh isɨn apiaghiri gumaziba, ko mɨdorozir gumazir uan mɨdorozir biziba ateriba, ko mɨdorozir gumazir oraba ko mɨdorozir sabar itir bar avɨrim, kɨ bar ia gekuigh ia inigh mangam.
